case.state: "Have Faith in the Hands of Chance, and Let it Burn!"
Yuno here, ready to go!
Ready to go! "Have Faith in the Hands of Chance, and Let it Burn!"
Strip poker is cool and all, but is anyone down for a game of Uno after this?
Oh hey, look. It's a Draw +2. Neat.
Oh, a Pot of Greed? We have those in Uno, too. They're called Draw +2 cards.
Yo, Betamon. Where's Misaka at? Surprised you didn't invite her for a game.
Huh, hey corgi. Surprised Kumatora isn't here. She sleeping or something?
Uh, you aren't Yanagi. At least, not the Yanagi I know. She's a friend of mine, but she looks almost nothing like you.
Oh... Nice to meet you. Didn't expect to run into someone else named Ayumi... Sorry, I'm gonna have to call you something else.
Huh. Didn't know there were other dudes named Gaku. Nice to meet you, all the same!
Game, start!
Let the game start!
That's interesting... I can kinda see something behind you. I feel like I shouldn't be able to. Maybe it's because of the Greek Visionary I met...?
Alright, let's see what we've got...
I zoned out last round and forgot we have to swap cards! Gah, this is nothing like Uno! I'm out of my depth here.
(Focus, Yuno. Don't let the boobs distract you.) Er... swap ~cards.text~?
Have Faith in the Hands of Chance, and Let it Burn!
I have to go beyond... {bold}Wild Draw Five!{!reset}

(Gaku. Ayumi. Yanagi. I'll believe in you, if you believe in me.)
{bold}Wild Draw Five!{!reset}
Skip turn!
Skip a turn!
Red zero!
Yellow zero!
Blue zero!
Green zero!
Have Faith in the Hands of Chance, and Let it Burn! I-I swap five!
Let's go! Draw ~cards.text~!
Red ~cards~!
Yellow ~cards~!
Blue ~cards~!
Green ~cards~!
Red ~rng(0-9)~!
Yellow ~rng(0-9)~!
Blue ~rng(0-9)~!
Green ~rng(0-9)~!
Scarlet ~rng(0-9)~!
Gold ~rng(0-9)~!
Azure ~rng(0-9)~!
Jade ~rng(0-9)~!
Yuno has awakened. Give him Average AI (Weight 1.00)
Yuno has awakened. Give him Good AI (Weight 3.00)
Yuno has awakened. Give him Best AI (Weight 2.00)
I managed to get a flush? Hah!
Just like Uno, I was able to match all the colors!
I managed to get a straight flush? Hah!
Just like Uno, I was able to match all the colors! I was even able to make the numbers line up, too!
I managed to get a royal flush? Hah!
Just like Uno, I was able to match all the colors! I was even able to make the numbers line up, too! You seriously can't do better than this!
I'll give you folks one more chance to back down. Otherwise, I can't be held responsible for my victory.
Alright, fine. You can look at my butt. I know, I know. It's great, isn't it?
I have no idea what I'm doing, but my good luck seems to be working!
Looks like a good hand... I think. I'm still learning.
Ehh, I'm not sure. This is probably a good set of cards?
What would I do if I was an anime protagonist?
Kings, Queens, Jacks... What comes after Jacks? Ten, right?
Gaku would be better at a game like this. He's really smart like that. Always analyzing the situation, explaining what the cards do to people who haven't played Uno in a while...
At least I don't have to listen to Keiya's pompous showboating. That man really knows how to ham it up with very little prompting.
Yuno Katsugo. Saving the world, one game of Uno at a time!
I think I'm getting lucky! With my cards, I mean.
Did you know there's this like, knock-off version of Uno called... I think it's called `Last Card'? It's crazy, the Wild Draw 4 becomes a "Draw 3". It's weird!
This hand is okay. Like, really okay. It's quite average. I don't know what else to say. We don't really get things like this in Uno.
At least nobody's getting their soul stolen in a game like this. Right?
Dang it! I can't stop thinking about the Pythagorean Theorem for some reason.
Bit of a risky move, but I can make it work.
The only thing worse than losing? Having to draw four cards when you're right at the cusp of saying "Uno".
When you get down to basics, all card games are just a matter of matching numbers or symbols.
I won't give up, as long as I believe in the hands of chance!
I won't give up, no matter how far I get pushed!
Alright, I know I should've expected something like this, but I was hoping at least one girl would show up to play, y'know?
Alright, ~othermale~? You and I have to work together, here. Bro code? Bro code.

You wanted me to be your wing-man, right ~human~? Well, too bad. You're mywing-man, now!
Heh, just kidding.
A squared plus B squared equals C squared... A squared plus B Squared equals C squared...
Alright, let's keep this between ourselves, okay?
If I lose, you may smack it. Once.
(This is getting desperate... But I've come back from worse. Like my darkest moment, fighting Ziro to save my friends... I'll just have to continue!)
This is bad... Reminds me of my first duel against Keiya. That Doubled Up Wild Draw Four still haunts me...
Well, I blew this hand.
I may be stupid.
At least this isn't Yami no Uno... I mean, uh, "Uno of Darkness." That stuff gets really tense, really fast.
I could really do with a theme music power-up right about now...
I need to believe in the Hands of Chance...! C'mon, Yuno, believe harder!
If I want to win, I need to believe in the Hands of Chance...!
Pardon my Japanese, but... Kuso!
I've been taking Uno for granted my entire life. I wish I was playing Uno right now.
Okay, I have this one pet peeve. I hate it when people keep talking down to you just because you have a particular hobby outside the norm. Anyone else?
Haha! Wow, my hand is absolutely terrible! I hope it's going better for you guys!

I've got a bad hand.
Er, that is, my wrist... I've got mild arthritis in my left arm, so I need to wear this compression glove... At least it blends right in with the official Uno League gear.

Dang thing's pulling again... Yeah, I've got a bad hand. Mild arthritis in my wrist, so I need this compression glove. That's just how it is for me. Plus, it blends right in with the Uno League equipment.
Alright, just waiting for someone to put the first card down!
Poker isn't normally my kind of thing. At least, not this kind of poker. I tried blackjack once, did pretty good at it until I suddenly didn't.
Lord in heaven, help me let go of my fear of failure. Let Satan have no hold over my heart and stop me from living and loving in your name. In the name of Jesus Christ, amen.
See, Reimu, I'm not really on the market right now, but I've got three good things. I can cook, I've almost got a degree, and I'm really good at playing Uno.
I dunno anyone who really likes getting bullied. If you say you don't like it, then why shouldn't I believe you?
My world? it's a little mundane, all things considered. Do you have a New York in your world?
My world? I dunno, it feels a little mundane. Do you guys have an America in your world, by chance? I'm guessing probably not.
Okay, so, I know you folks don't really get Uno like we do back on my world, but you've gotta try it. It's really great once you get into it. You play it at all, Heris?
Wait, am I suddenly in a zombie movie or something? Damn, I'm not prepared!
Well Fina, I've... Er, it's a little personal, but, I'm hardly a virgin? I've been naked with someone else before.
I-I mean, it's a little personal, but I'm not a virgin. So, I've been naked in front of other people for that, Fina.
Are you talking about friends with benefits? I dunno if I could do a relationship like that... Things would get too complicated.

When I'm not playing Uno, I take part in the good old American pastime of Baseball! I even got a home run, once!
... Once.
Yeah, I know about HP. I've played video games before. I'm not a total noob, you know!
Well, Trixie, I went through this ancient Greek necropolis to confront my enemy, Ziro. I guess a tomb is like a dungeon?
Sometimes you just have to knuckle down and-- Assassin certifications? Woah, jeez... Uh, I have no clue.
Favorite food? I do love a good {b}all American hamburger!{!reset}
Duel the devil for something? Hell no! Er, no pun intended. I like my soul intact and not going downstairs, thank you.
Funny you should ask, I was wondering what it'd be like to have a brother or sister to hang out with. Although, siblings usually fight, don't they?
I'm pretty good at shuffling cards! And dealing them. Plus, I'm a pretty good typist at 80 words per minute!
Wait, did I finish my essay for tomorrow? ... Crap, I think I forgot to write the last page.
Yeah, I have Uno! I've got a spare deck in my backpack. We can play a round after this, alright?
I mean, you can probably guess that I play Uno pretty frequently. Been trying to break out into other games, but none of them really speak to me.
You're from Japan, right? I'm actually half-Japanese myself! Born and raised in New York, though. Pretty sweet, speaking two languages.
Nice to meet some other folks from Japan. I'm actually half-Japanese myself! Though at heart, I'm a New Yorker down to the core.

What would Gaku say in a situation like this?
"It's ~self.hand~, Yuno. You can potentially use this to win the round, as long as the value of your hand is higher than that of your opponent's hands."

What would Ayumi say to cheer me up? Probably something like...
"Don't worry, Yuno! You've got this! You have ~self.hand~, there's a good chance you could pull through!"
Thanks, Ayumi!

What sort of witty remark would Yanagi make?
"Yuno, you dolt. You've got ~self.hand~, what are you even worrying about? Deal with these jokers, no sweat."
Well, gee, thanks Yanagi.
I can feel it now... I'm getting into the swing of things. My potential at this game could go anywhere! You'd better watch yourselves!
I'm down, but I'm not out... My skill and my luck always shine brightest when I'm in a tough spot. Prepare yourselves!
I can respect your skill, ~leader~. However, you won't last long once I turn things around!
... Oh, crap! I totally spaced out and forgot this isn't Uno! Like, duh, right?
... Oh, crap! I totally lost the plot there. This isn't Uno! Like, duh, right?
You know... This is far easier than a game of strip Uno. Takes much less time, too. We tried doing it by how many cards you had in hand... that was too much effort.
It's hard to believe that games like Uno have been around for centuries. It's similar to Crazy Eights, Mau Mau, Switch... And even crazier, an ancient Greek game!

Okay, I can tell that none of you are really buying into the whole "Using Uno to save the world" thing, but I'm being serious! I had to fight a guy called Ziro, too! Well, I say `guy', he was a demon. Literally.
Okay, listen. I get it. We all know where this is going, right? You want to see my abs, I know.
I'm still winning... Somehow. This is no problem for me, even if I'm down to my last chance!
Ahaha! Haha... Hah... Sorry, I just remembered a joke Daisuke told me... Anyway...
Ah, dang. I should've seen this one coming.
Eh? Me? Dangit, I'm losing my touch!
I swear I'm not doing this on purpose... I'm just bad at the game.
Yeah, I guess I'm not as good at strip poker as I would hope to be. Can't be good at everything you try, right?

Then we tried a version where the first person out is the only one who doesn't strip. But some Uno matches can take forever. We had to call it quits when we were four hours in and only down three layers each...
Most guys I know don't wear a button-up shirt like this, but I think it suits my style, you know?
If it wasn't obvious by now: I, Yuno Katsugo, have a dream. A dream of being the best Uno player in the world!

My grandma was the one to discover the history behind those ancient Greek games... roughly translated, they were called `Underworld Draws'. In those games, people could lose their lives -- or worse, their souls!
Not bragging, but I work out a little bit. I go for a jog every couple of days. That said, I don't work out constantly, you know? I've been trying to cut back on sweets since high school, too.
I'm not going to brag about keeping in shape, because I don't really try that hard. I go for a jog every now and again, and I try to keep sweets to a minimum.
Ziro was planning to use the power of Underworld Draws games to force people to wager their souls... If you lose against him, he steals your soul gets total control of your body. It's really freaky!
The power of Underworld Draws is scary. Through that, Ziro was planning to steal people's souls whenever they lost. He took control of two of my friends... It was tough on all of us.
But consider for a moment how much better it'll be for the game, when I do... this!
But consider this reversal! It'll be much more interesting when I do... this!
Aw, man. It's easy to tell when you're doing the worst... I'm the first guy to get his dick out, after all.
Come what may, I refuse to give up on that dream of mine!
Sorry, ladies, but the compression glove stays on from this point! ... Wait, that means I'm out of things to take off. Whoops.
Luckily, I was able to catch Ziro out. He had me on the ropes... but then he forgot to say "Uno" at a critical moment, then WHAM! I hit him with the classic "double Skip Go into quad 4s" play.

Lucky for me , I was able to catch Ziro out at a key moment. While he was gloating, he forgot to say "Uno". I called him out and he had to draw four, then WHAM! I hit him with the classic "double Skip Go into quad 4s" play.
Oh, shoot! I forgot to talk about how special my jacket was, and what it means to me. Oh well, maybe next time!
It's a good thing Underworld Draws is so similar to the card game Uno by Mattel Inc., isn't it? Otherwise, the world might have been-- know what, I'll stop for now.
I'm just glad that Underworld Draws plays almost exactly like the card game Uno by Mattel Inc., otherwise the world could've been doomed to-- know what, I'll should stop rambling.
... Okay, yeah, doing this was a lot funnier in my head. And less embarrassing, too.
... Okay, when I ran this idea through my mind, it was a lot funner. And less embarrassing.
(Crap, I'm getting hard, and I can't even hide it.) Ahaha... Yeah, let's just keep going, alright?
(Ah crap, stay down! Dangit, it's getting hard and I can't even cover it up.) Ahaha... Yeah, let's just move on, alright?
Maybe I should get a new wardrobe one of these days. I've basically got an identical copy of everything except that number one jacket of mine.
I feel like I should get a bigger wardrobe. I've got copies of the same clothes over and over, and it feels like I've been wearing the same things for two years now.
Looks like you're up to bat, Ignatz! You're something of an artist, right? You a landscape or a portrait painter?
And Ignatz steps up to bat! You're some kind of artist, right? Do you do portraits or landscapes? Or both?
Hmm... The way you talk, it makes it sound like you're from some kind of... Do you have dragons or magic or stuff like that in your world, Ignatz? Just as important, do you have Uno?
The way you've been talking about stuff, it makes me think... Do you have dragons or wizards and magic in your world, Ignatz? More importantly, do you have Uno?
(They say that one in three guys is secretly gay. I hope it's ~player~, he's really cute!)
(They do say that one in three guys is secretly gay leaning. I hope it's ~player~, he's pretty cute!)
Your turn, ~name~!
Hey, I'm not complaining if it's someone else's turn!
Guess I'm safe for another round, right?
Sorry, ~name~. That's just how the wheel of fate turns.
You're not giving it your all, are you? That's why you lost.
If you want to survive, you have to give it your all.
At least the worst that can happen is... Well, you know.
Dang thing is pulling again... Hmm? Oh, sorry. Go ahead and do the thing, ~name~.
I hope this isn't too cheesy, but "go ahead and take something off for us, ~name~!"
Man, I'm really jonesing for a snack right about now. Anyone else got the munchies?
You're up, ~name~. Make it a good one!
You know the rules, and so do I! (Kind of.)
This is a placeholder line until I work out this interaction with Ignatz.
Language, Aoba! Tsk, tsk.
Hey, Aoba, watch your language! Tsk, tsk.
You're up, L'ara. Gotta say, I really I like your outfi! You're really rocking that mad scientist look.
Looks like you're up first, L'ara. I have to say, I'm really digging your princess gear. I especially like that you have two capes, haha!

So... Aella, sorry if this question doesn't make any sense. You're like... You're an actual warrior woman, right? You're not just someone in cosplay? 'Cause I've seen a couple people dress up in fantasy gear around New York before.

Have you ever had to do any kind of magical games of destiny on your journeys, Aella? Especially seemingly innocuous, kid-friendly games that have stakes like "Oh, if you lose the duel, you lose your soul!" or the like?
So, Meia. You're from another planet, right? Like, literally speaking. What's the food like? I've always wondered what space food would taste like.
Meia, you're from another world, right? Like, you're from outer space, not a different dimension... Anyway, what's the food like on your planet? I've always wanted to try space food.
How much did you actually know about Earth before coming here, Meia? I'm guessing you did some kind of background check to make sure your head didn't explode, or something.
Did you know a lot about Earth before coming here, Meia? I imagine you came prepared in case your eyes popped or your head exploded... or something.
So, just out of curiosity, are all the women from Mejare so... well-endowed?
Just asking 'cause I'm curious, are all the women from Mejare as... well-endowed as you are, Meia?
Looks like you're next, L'ara. I have to say, I'm really digging your princess gear. I especially like that you have two capes, not many people do that these days.
Eh? She's not going to hit people with her staff, is she? C'mon, L'ara, just be chill!
L'ara, come on now, be chill! Don't threaten people with your staff, getting hit with that thing would seriously hurt!
I like your do, Kumatora! Never seen anyone rocking bubblegum pink hair before... Which is saying a lot considering how bold some of my friends' are.
(~Player~ hasn't really looked at the girls... She must be straight, right? Wait, does that mean I'm...?)
That's another one down! Hah!
~Name~ lost? No complaints from me!
Maybe there's some skill involved after all.
Sorry, ~name~. That's just how the cookie crumbles.
If you don't give it your all, you can't expect to win all the time!
Looks like you're the one suffering the penalty this time!
At least there's no real punishment for failing. Aside from the obvious.
Darn this thing, catching around my wrist... Huh? Oh, go right ahead, ~name~.
I'm surprised there aren't more guys hanging around this place. A lotta horny dudes would leap at the chance for a game like this...
You've gotta take the good with the bad, ~name~. On the one hand, you lost. On the other, you might not lose next time!
Looks like you're up, ~name~. Make it a good one!
Let's get down to business... It's your turn, ~name~!
A tie? Huh. So what happens now? Do we draw another card? Or do we just start over?
Another tie, huh? The hands of chance must be having fun with us to~background.time~.
Everyone wants the game to last longer, don't they?
~clothing.ifPlural(Do they|Does it)~ do anything special?
It's nice that we can choose what we take off. But it also means stuff like this happens.
Let's see... Can I come up with a witty remark about your ~clothing~ in the next twenty seconds?
So that's how it is, huh?
Oh, really now? That's it?
Oh, really? Can't blame you for a move like that.
I guess it's only natural to take ~clothing.ifPlural(those|that)~ off...
As long as you take ~clothing.ifPlural(them|that)~ off with a smile!
Take it one step at a time, like everybody else!
Eh? ~clothing.ifPlural(Are they|Is that)~ really it?
Okay, sure, whatever. Take as long as you need.
~clothing.ifPlural(Those weren't|That wasn't)~ hiding as much as you think ~clothing.ifPlural(they|it)~ does, dude!

state.text: Feels weird that you'd wait until now to take ~clothing.ifPlural(those|that)~ off, but hey, it's your call.

case.state: There, did that help? Let's keep going, then!
No point crying about stripped ~clothing~, right?
You're playing a long game. I can respect it.
Nope. Couldn't think of something witty. Maybe next time?
You forgot the super secret rule before taking ~clothing.ifPlural(those|it)~ off! ... Okay, that's a lie.
Oh, hang on, this thing's riding up again. There.
That wasn't very cash money of you, ~name~.
Not doing me any favors, here.
Wish I'd kept my phone on me or something.
Just waiting for things to finish up, really.
Yikes. That Ultron dude sounds like a total creep. Reminds me of what Ziro did to my friends in the worst possible way.
... Wait, is it a magic staff? Looks like it needs new batteries.
... Oh, it's a magic staff? Right, well, it looks like it needs a new pair of AA's.
Oh, really? Can't blame you for a move like that.
I guess it's only natural to take ~clothing.ifPlural(those|that)~ off...
As long as you take ~clothing.ifPlural(them|that)~ off with a smile!
Take it one step at a time, like everybody else!
Everyone wants the game to last longer, don't they?
~clothing.ifPlural(Do they|Does it)~ do anything special?
It's nice that we can choose what we take off. But it also means stuff like this happens.
Let's see... Can I come up with a witty remark about your ~clothing~ in the next twenty seconds?
So that's how it is, huh? Not taking any chances, I see.
Wait, is that really it? You're not being a bit more daring than that? Not taking a chance?
Eh? ~clothing.ifPlural(Are they|Is that)~ really it?
I'm a bit impressed you kept ~clothing.ifPlural(those|that)~ on this long.
~clothing.ifPlural(Those weren't|That wasn't)~ hiding as much as you think ~clothing.ifPlural(they|it)~ were...

state.text: Okay, then. It's your call how you want to play this game... and take off your clothes. More power to you.

case.state: There, did that help? Let's keep going, then!
No point crying about stripped ~clothing~, right?
Playing a long-term strategy in a game of chance? I can respect that.
Nah, I couldn't think of anything witty. Maybe next round?
You forgot the super secret rule before taking ~clothing.ifPlural(those|it)~ off! ... Okay, that's a lie.
Oh, hang on, this thing's riding up again. There.
Am I a joke to you, or something?
C'mon, get serious... Please?
Maybe I need to get a tighter fitting glove?
I don't mean to sound pushy or anything, but I'm kinda done here, so please don't drag this out.
Don't be shy, now! But don't be too bold, either.
I can't exactly judge what other people wear. I've been rocking this look for a few years now.
Just a nice, friendly game of strip poker, right? So taking something like ~clothing.ifPlural(those|that)~ off is what you'd expect to see.
I wonder if anyone else tries to match the color of their friend's stuff?
Living on the edge, ~name~? I can tell you like to live dangerously!
Cheering you on from over here, dude!
Hm? Something wrong? Not feeling up to anything this round?
You've got this! Try to ignore me if you want.
What matters is that you have f-fun.
Don't give up! M-Maybe you won't have to jerk it, unlike me!
Guess I was beaten before you got to the good stuff.
Let's see... How could I encourage you this time? Hmm.
Match the color to the last item stripped! Nah, could you imagine?
Such a shame to see ~clothing.ifPlural(them|it)~ go, but that's the way the game goes!
Come on, ~name~, let's laugh about this! Hah! Haha!
There, isn't that freeing without ~clothing.ifPlural(those|that)~ ~clothing~?
That's okay, take your time. The ~background.time~ is young.
Hey, no complaints here. It keeps the game interesting, right?
It's only a big deal if we make it one, right? Like, we don't need to pressure each other.
(Even if it's something small, seeing a guy strip is getting my blood going...)
Oh right. Remember to check yourselves for lumps, guys! Male health is important!
Put it somewhere safe, alright? We wouldn't want ~target~ losing his ~clothing~.
(Be still, my beating heart. The best is yet to come. Heh, come.)
Oh man, I wish I could pull off ~clothing~ like ~clothing.ifPlural(those|that)~!
All eyes are on you, ~name~. Even mine.
I wonder if I should use this time wisely... to come up with a new Uno strategy.
Your skills at strip poker are... most impressive.
Don't be shy, now! But don't be too bold, either.
I can't exactly judge what other people wear. I've been rocking this look for a few years now.
I wonder if anyone else tries to match the color of their friend's stuff?
Y-Yeah, do what you feel like!
I'm on the edge of my seat... metaphorically speaking.
Do you feel like you're getting into the mood, ~name~?
D-Don't mind me! Go right ahead.
Maybe I should try harder to win next time... Hah, harder.
Oh... Oh that's what you're going with?
Go ahead and show some skin, ~name~!
Don't let me influence your choices... Take off what you want.
You'll be fine, right? I mean, you're already `fine', but you now what I mean.
Just 'cause I'm out of the game doesn't mean I can't enjoy the show, right?
No joke, this is pretty fun. I didn't expect to get so invested in this game.
One step closer to the inevitable conclusion...
Do you feel better without your ~clothing~ on?
Strip poker is a bit more predictable than Uno, huh? It's all leading in one direction.
There, nothing to be worked up about! Yeah...
Don't think I'd need to contest that play!
... Ah, sorry.
Hah...!
T-That makes me a little happy, at least.
(Easy now, Yuno. Don't wanna blow your load just because she took off her ~clothing~.)
Yeah, makes sense. I totally get why you went with ~clothing.ifPlural(those|that)~.
Wait, I just had an idea, we-- nope, it's gone.
I get better with every game I play! I could always beat you next time.
Seems like a fair choice to me. Who am I to judge?
Looks like the next big step for you, ~name~.
Really getting to the good stuff now, aren't we?
Think you're still gonna win against this master of Uno-- I mean, poker?
We're really getting into the meat of things, aren't we? ... Er, forget I said "meat", please.
Looks like we're really doing this...
You can do it, ~name~!
My faith in the hands of chance pays off for a little longer...
... Okay, I'm a little curious. What're you hiding under there?
... Okay, okay. You have my attention.
Is it bad that I want you to hurry up and get this over with?
For some reason, I'm really craving a half sub. Why do we always get hungry after getting off? Or is that just me?
Huh, what if I played that card first...? Oh, sorry, my mind was elsewhere.
Getting closer to wrapping things up, right?
Sorry, I'm no good at being a spectator. That's more of Gaku's thing.
You look pretty good without ~clothing.ifPlural(those|that)~ weighing you down!
Yeah, things are starting to heat up if you had to give ~clothing.ifPlural(those|that)~ up...
Not bad, not bad. Let's see what happens when you lose again!
Not bad. Decent choice all around. Totally not distracting me or anything.
Just another step closer to endgame.
There, that wasn't so hard? Was it? (Why did I have to say "hard"?)
Good choice. Didn't think taking off ~clothing~ could be this exciting.
Seeing you take ~clothing.ifPlural(them|it)~ off gave me the chills for some reason.
I'm learning a lot from the way you play. Learning from other duelists is a vital skill for improving!
Trying to save the good stuff for last? I can see how you think that'd work.
And ~name~ takes to the stage, ready to make her big play...
We're getting right into the good parts, aren't we? Not that I mind.
Think you're good enough to last against Yuno Katsugo, two time Uno League champ? {small}Even though this isn't Uno?{!reset}
I wonder if Yanagi would pull off ~clothing.ifPlural(~clothing~ like those|a ~clothing~ like that)~?
Looks like another win for Yuno! ... Okay saying my own name just made it weird.
That's a penalty for you! And it's something big this time!
I'm definitely starting to see why so many people come here...
And here goes another one... Another card, another layer, same difference...
